info.title: Agrirouter© Middleware
info.description: Middleware to access the agrirouter© using a 'smaller' API. The middleware will handle the connection for all endpoints and fetches / stores messages from the agrirouter© within a custom database.

tags.name: agrirouter© callback
tags.description: The callback for the agrirouter. This callback has to be referenced within the newly created application.

tags.name: non telemetry data management
tags.description: Operations for non telemetry data management, i.e. publish images, task data or documents to the agrirouter.

tags.name: application management
tags.description: Operations for the application management, i.e. register, add supported technical message types and status checks.

tags.name: endpoint management
tags.description: Operations for the endpoint management, i.e. status checking or searching for endpoints.

tags.name: farming software management
tags.description: Operations for farming software management, i.e. onboard process for endpoints or revoking endpoints.

tags.name: telemetry data management
tags.description: Operations for telemetry data management, i.e. search for telemetry data, search for time log periods or fetch data from the internal storage.

tags.name: telemetry platform management
tags.description: Operations for telemetry platform management, i.e. onboard process for (virtual) endpoints or revoking endpoints.

tags.name: maintenance
tags.description: Maintenance operations for internal usage. Do NOT use this profile in production.

put.description: Reset the password for an existing tenant within the middleware.

201.description: In case the password for the tenant was reset.

400.description: In case of a parameter validation exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

put.description: Resend the capabilities and subscriptions for the endpoint.

201.description: In case the operation was successful.

400.description: In case of a parameter validation exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

200.description: The application has been updated successfully.

400.description: In case of a parameter validation exception.

201.description: The application has been registered and was created successfully.

400.description: In case of a parameter validation exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

post.description: Register a new tenant within the middleware. Can be skipped if you only use the default tenant.

get.description: Create an authorization URL for the telemetry platform.

400.description: In case of a business exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

get.description: Find all tenants within the middleware.

200.description: In case there are tenants.

400.description: In case of a parameter validation exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

get.description: Create an authorization URL for the telemetry platform.

parameters.name: internalApplicationId
parameters.description: The internal ID of the application.

parameters.name: redirectUrl
parameters.description: The redirect URL for this onboard request.

302.description: The URL (as redirect) to authorize the creation of an endpoint within the account of the user.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

get.description: The callback for the onboard process. Used by the agrirouter© to send the onboard process data.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state to identify the request internally.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token containing the information for the onboard process, generated by the agrirouter.

parameters.name: signature
parameters.description: Signature from the agrirouter, used for validation.

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Error information, in case the onboard process failed.

302.description: In case of a successful response, the callback redirects to an internal page to show the result of the onboard process.

400.description: In case of a parameter validation exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

get.description: Download a file for an existing endpoint.

200.description: Response containing the result.

400.description: In case of a business exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

get.description: Fetch the recipients of an existing endpoint.

200.description: Response with all the recipients available.

404.description: In case that the endpoint was not found.

400.description: In case of an business exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

get.description: Fetch the health status of an existing endpoint.

200.description: The endpoint is connected and is able to communicate.

404.description: In case that the endpoint was not found.

400.description: In case of an business exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

503.description: In case the endpoint is currently not connected.

get.description: Fetch the cloud-onboarding failures for the virtual endpoint id.

200.description: The status information for this endpoint.

204.description: In case there is no failure.

400.description: In case of a parameter validation exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

200.description: In case the operation was successful.

delete.description: Delete the application incl. all endpoints and other data. Handle with care, the data is lost forever.

201.description: In case the operation was successful.

400.description: In case of a parameter validation exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

delete.description: Revoke a telemetry platform from the middleware and remove all of its data, incl. virtual endpoints, messages, logs, etc.

200.description: The revoke process was successful.

400.description: In case of a business exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

delete.description: Revoke a farming software from the middleware and remove all of its data, incl. virtual endpoints, messages, logs, etc.

200.description: The revoke process was successful.

400.description: In case of a business exception.

500.description: In case of an unknown error.

accessToken.description: Access token for API usage. Will be shown only once, therefore better save this one.

TenantRegistrationResponse.description: The response after the tenant was registered.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response to map the internal errors and provide clean API description.

ParameterValidationProblemResponse.description: Generic error response to map parameter validation errors and provide clean API description without publishing internals.

id.description: The technical ID of the entity.

applicationId.description: The agrirouter© ID of the application.

internalApplicationId.description: The internal ID of the application.

versionId.description: The version of the application. Each agrirouter© version creates a new application in the middleware.

supportedTechnicalMessageTypes.description: The supported technical message types for this version of the application.

ApplicationDto.description: A container holding the basic representation of an application.

technicalMessageType.description: The technical message type, that the application does support, i.e. TaskData, EFDI, etc.

direction.description: The direction the message type can be handled, i.e. SEND, RECEIVE, SEND_RECEIVE.

SupportedTechnicalMessageTypeDto.description: A container holding the basic representation of a supported technical message type.

UpdateApplicationResponse.description: The response after an application has been successfully updated.

internalApplicationId.description: The internal ID of the application.

base64EncodedPrivateKey.description: The private key of the application. Only needed if the application is an instance of a farming software or telemetry platform. The private key has to be Base64 encoded.

base64EncodedPublicKey.description: The public key of the application. Only needed if the application is an instance of a farming software or telemetry platform. The public key has to be Base64 encoded.

redirectUrl.description: The redirect URL for the application. To configure a custom redirect URL that matches the location of the service.

UpdateApplicationRequest.description: The request parameters to update the existing application.

supportedTechnicalMessageTypes.description: The list of supported technical message types.

AddSupportedTechnicalMessageTypeRequest.description: The container holding the parameters to add the supported technical messages types.

AddRouterDeviceRequest.description: The container holding the parameters to add a router device.

Authentication.description: The authentication details for a router device.

ConnectionCriteria.description: Connection details for a router device.

RouterDevice.description: A router device from the AR.

name.description: Name of the tenant, has to be unique.

TenantRegistrationRequest.description: The request holding information to register a new tenant.

externalVirtualEndpointId.description: The ID of the new virtual endpoint within the middleware.

endpointName.description: The list of names for the virtual endpoints.

OnboardVirtualEndpointRequest.description: Necessary information to create the virtual endpoint.

externalEndpointId.description: The ID of the endpoint within the middleware.

internalDeviceIds.description: The list of internal device IDs to search for.

items.description: The list of internal device IDs to search for.

filterEmptyEntries.description: Filter empty entries, like machines and time periods.

sendFrom.description: The beginning of the time interval. Default value would be 4 weeks ago.

sendTo.description: The end of the time interval.

SearchTelemetryDataPeriodsRequest.description: The request with all necessary information to search for the time log periods.

sendFrom.description: The beginning of the time interval. Default value would be 4 weeks ago.

sendTo.description: The end of the time interval.

ddisToList.description: The DDIs to list, if null or empty all DDIs will be listed and no filter will be applied.

items.description: The DDIs to list, if null or empty all DDIs will be listed and no filter will be applied.

SearchTelemetryDataRequest.description: The request with all necessary information to search for the telemetry data (time logs).

externalEndpointId.description: The ID of the endpoint within the middleware.

internalDeviceIds.description: The list of internal device IDs to search for.

items.description: The list of internal device IDs to search for.

SearchMachinesRequest.description: The request for searching for machines.

teamSetContextId.description: The team set context ID, provided by the agrirouter.

RegisterMachineResponse.description: The response when registering a machine.

customTeamSetContextId.description: Your custom team set context ID, in case you want to define it by your own. If the field is empty, a unique ID will be generated.

base64EncodedDeviceDescription.description: The device description itself, should be Base64 encoded.

RegisterMachineRequest.description: The request the information to register a machine.

PublishTimeLogDataRequest.description: The request body containing all necessary information to publish a time log.

sendFrom.description: The beginning of the time interval. Default value would be 4 weeks ago.

sendTo.description: The end of the time interval.

SearchFilesRequest.description: The request body containing all necessary information to search for file headers.

recipients.description: The recipients for direct sending. If there is a recipient, the file will not be published.

items.description: The recipients for direct sending. If there is a recipient, the file will not be published.

PublishNonTelemetryDataMessageTuple.description: Internal class to encapsulate the message tuples.

videoType.description: The video type, used to map the specific agrirouter© message type.

PublishVideoDataRequest.description: The request body containing all necessary information to publish video files.

PublishNonTelemetryDataRequest.description: The request body containing all necessary information to publish PDF files.

imageType.description: The image type, used to map the specific agrirouter© message type.

PublishImageDataRequest.description: The request body containing all necessary information to publish image files.

externalEndpointIds.description: The list of external endpoint IDs.

items.description: The list of external endpoint IDs.

EndpointStatusRequest.description: The to search for one or multiple endpoints.

additionalProperties.description: The status for each of the endpoints. This would be either a HTTP 200, if the endpoint is connected, a HTTP 503 if the endpoints has some problems or a HTTP 404 otherwise.

endpointStatus.description: The status for each of the endpoints. This would be either a HTTP 200, if the endpoint is connected, a HTTP 503 if the endpoints has some problems or a HTTP 404 otherwise.

EndpointHealthStatusResponse.description: The response when asking for an endpoint health status.

externalEndpointIds.description: The IDs of the endpoints for the status check.

items.description: The IDs of the endpoints for the status check.

RegisterApplicationResponse.description: The response after an application has been successfully registered.

applicationId.description: The agrirouter© ID of the application.

versionId.description: The version of the application. Each agrirouter© version creates a new application in the middleware.

base64EncodedPrivateKey.description: The private key of the application. Only needed if the application is an instance of a farming software or telemetry platform. The private key has to be Base64 encoded.

base64EncodedPublicKey.description: The public key of the application. Only needed if the application is an instance of a farming software or telemetry platform. The public key has to be Base64 encoded.

redirectUrl.description: The redirect URL for the application. To configure a custom redirect URL that matches the location of the service.

ApplicationRegistrationRequest.description: The request parameters to register an application.

tenants.description: The tenants found for the request.

FindTenantResponse.description: The response when searching for tenants.

TenantDto.description: Representation of a tenant within the middleware.

messageRecipients.description: The message recipients for this endpoint.

EndpointRecipientsResponse.description: The response when asking for the recipients of an endpoint.

FindApplicationResponse.description: The response when searching for an application.

externalEndpointId.description: The external ID of an endpoint.

agrirouterAccountId.description: The account ID for this endpoint.

externalEndpointId.description: The external ID of an endpoint.

connectedVirtualEndpoints.description: All the children of the endpoint.

agrirouterAccountId.description: The account ID for this endpoint.

EndpointWithChildrenDto.description: Representation of an endpoint with all children.

FindEndpointsForApplicationResponse.description: The response when searching for endpoints belonging to the application.

ApplicationStatusResponse.description: Response class to show the current status of an application.

id.description: The technical ID of the entity.

applicationId.description: The agrirouter© ID of the application.

internalApplicationId.description: The internal ID of the application.

versionId.description: The version of the application. Each agrirouter© version creates a new application in the middleware.

endpointsWithStatus.description: The status information for all endpoints within the application.

ApplicationWithEndpointStatusDto.description: The current status of the application incl. its endpoints.

cached.description: Is the connection available and cached?

connected.description: Is the connection still connected to the AR?

clientId.description: The client ID of the connection.

ConnectionStateDto.description: The current status of the connection.

nrOfMessagesWithinTheInbox.description: The number of messages within the inbox.

EndpointStatusDto.description: The connection status of an endpoint.

externalEndpointId.description: The external ID of an endpoint.

deactivated.description: The current status of an endpoint, could be active or deactivated.

internalApplicationId.description: The internal ID of the application.

versionId.description: The ID of the application version.

agrirouterAccountId.description: The account ID for this endpoint.

nrOfMessagesCached.description: Nr. of messages that are cached.

externalEndpointIds.description: The list of endpoint IDs for the virtual endpoints.

items.description: The list of endpoint IDs for the virtual endpoints.

RevokeVirtualEndpointRequest.description: The necessary information to revoke the virtual endpoint.

secured.description: Default security scheme, used for the private flows.
